verses.content: Aron naupasalhai pahniin LALPA an va hnaia an thi pha hnung chun, LALPA chun Mosie a biek a;

LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “I unaupa Aron hril la, puonzâr sûng hmun inthiengah, bâwm chunga zângaina ṭhungpha hmaa chun a hung zing zing ding a ni nawh, thi rawi a tih; zângaina ṭhungpha chungah sûm lai ka hung inlâr ding a ni sih a.
Hieng ang hin Aron chu hmun inthienga chun a fe ding a nih; suol inthâwina dingin bâwng tuoi, pum- rawhmang thilinhlân dingin berâm- chal leh.

Puon zai inhmi zakaw chung chu hâk a ta, a tisa inkhumna dingin puon zai inhmi kekawr chu bun a ta, puon zai inhmi kâwngkhiin inhrêng a ta, puon zai inhmi lukhum a khum ding a nih; hieng hi silfên inthieng a nih. Insil zet zet a ta; chun, ân bel ding a nih.
Israel thla mipuihaia inthawkin, suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal pahni le pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin berâmchal pakhat chawi a tih.
“Chun, Aron chun ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu inhlân a ta, ama le a sûnghai ta dingin intlanna siem a tih.
Kêl pahni chu kei a ta, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah LALPA hmaah sieng a tih.
Chun, Aron chun kêl pahni chungchânga chun aisân a ta, pakhat chu LALPA chanpuol nîng a ta, pa- khat chu Azazel chanpuol nîng a tih.
Aron chun LALPA chanpuola tlu kêl chu lâng a ta, suol inthâwina dingin inhlân a tih.
Azazel chanpuola tlu kêl ruok chu intlanna siemna dingin, Azazel ta dinga thlalêra insuo dingin LALPA hmaah a hringin sieng a tih.
“Aron chun ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu lâng a ta, ama le a sûnghai ta dingin intlanna siem a ta; ama puola suol inthâwina bâwngchal chu that a tih.
Chun, meilâkna meilinga sip, mâichâma inthawkin LALPA hmaa chun lâng a ta, riminhnik inhniktak rawt dip dap ṭhûm hni leh puonzâr sûng tieng chun hung lûtpui a tih.
Riminhnik khû chun, thu- thlungna bâwm chunga, zângaina ṭhungpha chu bâwm dingin, LALPA hmaah meia chun riminhnik chu phul a tih, chuong naw chun thi rawi a tih.
Bâwngchal thisen iengzât ama- ni chu lâng a ta, a kutpârin zângaina ṭhungpha hmatieng pang chu thêng a ta; chun, a kutpârin zângaina ṭhung- pha hmabul vêl chu, thisen chun vawi sari a the ding a nih.

“Mipui puola suol inthâwina kêl chu that a ta, a thisen chu puonzâr sûng tienga chun hung lûtpui a ta; a thisen chu bâwngchal thisen a thaw ang bawk khan thâwng a ta, zângaina ṭhungpha le, zângaina ṭhungpha hmabul vêl chu thêng a tih.

Chuongchun, Israel thlahai inthiengnawna lei dâm, an bawsiet- nahai lei dâm, an suolnahai lei dâmin hmun inthieng puola dingin intlanna siem a ta; chuong ang chun, an inthiengnawna laia chêng intuokna puon in puola ding khawmin siem a tih.

Hmun inthienga intlanna siem dinga a lût lai chun, ama le a sûnghai le Israel mipuihai puola intlanna a siem zoa a hung suok nâwk hmakhat chun, tukhawm intuokna puon in sûnga chun an um ding a ni nawh.
LALPA hmaa mâichâm tieng chun suok a ta, chu puola ding chun intlanna siem a ta; bâwngchal thisen le kêl thisen iengzât amani chu lâng a ta, mâichâm kia chun a vêlin nâl a tih.
Chun, a kutpârin vawi sari thêng a ta, inthien a tih; chuongchun, Israel thlahai inthiengnawnaa in- thawk chun sukthieng a tih.
“Hmun inthieng le intuokna puon in le mâichâm puola intlanna a siem zo chun kêl hring lai chu inhlân a ta;

Aron chun kêl hring lai lu chunga chun,a kut a khing pahniin innghat a ta, a chunga chun Israel thlahai rîtlonahai po po, an baw- sietnahai po po, a suolna po po chenin insam a ta, chuonghai chu kêl lu chunga chun innghat a ta, mi pakhat a iruotsa khan thlalêr tieng ṭhuoi hmang dai a tih.
Kêl chun an rîtlona po po chu chêng nawna rama chun phur a ta, kêl chu thlalêra chun ân suo ding a nih.
“Chun, Aron chu intuokna puon ina chun lût a ta, hmun inthieng a lût laia puon zai inhmi silfên a hâk chu hlîp a ta, chutaka chun mâksan a ta;

hmun inthienga chun insil a ta, a silfên inbel a ta, suok a ta, ama puola pumrawhmang thilinhlân le mipui puola pumrawhmang thilin- hlân chu inhlân a ta, ama le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem a tih.
Chun, suol inthâwina thâu chu mâichâma chun rawng a tih.
Chun, Azazel kuoma kêl in- suotu taphawt chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, chu zo chun a umna hmun tieng chun a kir nâwk ding a nih.
Suol inthâwina bâwngchal le suol inthâwina kêl, an thisen intlan- na siemna dinga hmun inthienga an lûtpui chu, riebûk puotienga fepui nîng a ta; a vun dâm, a sa dâm, a êk dâm chu an raw ding a nih.
A rawtu chun a puonhai sâwp a ta, insil a ta, chu zo chun riebûk tieng hung thei a tih.
“Chun, hi hi in kumkhaw dân ding nîng a tih; thla sarina, chu thla ni sâwm ni chun insukrinum in ta, sin hrim hrim in thaw ding a ni nawh, a ram mi khawmin, nangni laia um ram dang mi khawmin.
Hi ni hin, nangni sukthiengna ding cheuin in ta dingin intlanna siem a ni ding a ni sih a; chuongchun, LALPA hmaa chun in suolna po poa inthawk hung inthieng in tih.
In ta dingin châwl ṭawk ṭawkna ni a na, in insukrinum ding a nih; hi hi in kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
Chun, thiempu, a pa aia thiem- pu ni dinga hriek nâl le, suktuma um chun intlanna siem a ta, puon zai inhmi silfên inthieng chu inbel a ta;
hmun inthieng puol dingin intlanna siem a ta, intuokna puon in le mâichâm puola ding chun intlanna siem bawk a ta; chun, thiempuhai le mipuihai ta dingin intlanna siem bawk a tih.
An suolna po po leia kum tin vawi khat Israel thlahai ta dinga intlanna siem hi in kumkhaw dân ding a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, LALPAIN thu a pêk ang chun Mosie chun a thaw tah a.
